fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: International Trade, FTAs - Internal market, Goods Package - digital market, GDPR, e-privacy - sustainability topics
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The H&M group wants to make sustainable, good-quality fashion accessible to as many people as possible. H&M group's aim at EU level is to monitor EU developments on topics of interest for the company and inform EU decision-makers about H&M group's work and position.
